kv2.6:1.1_0: the fuel of suffering in the road.
kv2.6:1.3_0: Anyone who develops all kinds of suffering should be developed by developing and cultivating the path.
kv2.6:2.11_0: The account of the Lord of Death is finished.
kv2.6:2.1_0: Anyone who develops all kinds of suffering should be developed by developing and cultivating the path.
kv2.6:2.3_0: Moreover, showing the fools, and turning pure white.
kv2.6:2.7_0: a murderer of a perfected one,
kv2.6:2.8_0: of one who has caused the Buddha to bleed,
kv2.6:2.9_0: He speaks in schism in the Sangha; he develops the eightfold path in the Sangha;
